translation_rules: padConcat({inventory_id, src_filename, map_sheet_id, orig_stand_id, ogc_fid}, {4,15,10,10,7}, {'x','x','x','x','x'}, '-', TRUE, TRUE)
description: Create cas_id using the unique identifier poly_id added during loading.
Only one LYR layer possible. If species info present, stand structure is SINGLE_LAYERED.

Counts number of layers based on the presence of a not null value for attributes representing each layer. Up to a max of 2. Returns UNKNOWN_VALUE if num_of_layers is zero. num_of_layers should always be 0 or 1 because every row is either DST, NFL or LYR. Counts non-productive productivity codes as a LYR layer if species not present.
Converts source area from m2 to ha. Return OUT_OF_RANGE for any zero values.
